resources.string: Practice deep breathing for 5 minutes to relieve stress.
Take a short walk to refresh your mind and body.
Write down three things you\'re grateful for today.
Read a chapter of a book to relax and gain new insights.
Stretch for 10 minutes to improve flexibility and reduce tension.
Limit screen time before bed to improve sleep quality.
LEvery hour, take a 5-minute break from your work to rest your eyes and stretch your body.
Dedicate 15 minutes a day to learning a new skill or exploring a topic of interest
Take time to call or visit family and friends. A strong support system is essential for well-being.
"Before going to bed, take a few minutes to think about what went well today and what you can improve tomorrow.
TDo light exercise every morning for 30 minutes to stay fit and energized.
